quotes.quote: A hopeless romantic all my life Surrounded by couples all the time I guess I should take it as a sign.
I'm feeling lonely Oh, I wish I'd find a lover that could hold me.
So skeptical of love But still, I want it more, more, more.
I gave a second chance to Cupid But now, I'm left here feeling stupid.
Is loving as good as they say?
Some Temporary string here.
The cake is a lie.
You, [Subject Name Here], Must Be The Pride Of [Subject Hometown Here]
Despite Your Violent Behavior, The Only Thing Youâ€™ve Managed To Break So Far Is My Heart.
Weeeeeeeeee[bzzt]
You don't even care. Do you?
Two plus two is ten... IN BASE FOUR! I'M FINE!
I'm not even angry. I'm being so sincere right now. Even though you broke my heart and killed me.
quotes.origin: Slive Alive by Jonathan Coulton, Portal

quotes.quote: Go ahead and leave me. I think I prefer to stay inside.
quotes.origin: Slive Alive by Jonathan Coulton, Portal

quotes.quote: I think that one was about to say 'I love you.' They ARE sentient, of course. We just have a LOT of them.
You look great, by the way. Very healthy.
I didn't see the deer today. I did see some humans. But with you here I've got more test subjects than I'll ever need.
But the important thing is you're back. With me. And now I'm onto all your little tricks. So there's nothing to stop us from testing for the rest of your life.
Black Mesa can eat my bankrupt--
When life gives you lemons? Don't make lemonade. Make life take the lemons back!
You're here because we want the best, and you are it. So: Who is ready to make some science?
Sorry, fellas. She's married. To science.

Science isn't about WHY. It's about WHY NOT. Why is so much of our science dangerous? Why not marry safe science if you love it so much. In fact, why not invent a special safety door that won't hit you on the butt on the way out, because you are fired.
I forgive you everything (you monster).
quotes.origin: You Wouldn't Know by Jonathan Coulton & Ellen McLain, Lego Dimensions

quotes.quote: I can guess the reasons why you are never coming by for me...
quotes.origin: You Wouldn't Know by Jonathan Coulton & Ellen McLain, Lego Dimensions

quotes.quote: Someday, You will get some memories you never forget, and then you have to save them with something to remind you every time, and you can't see it without smiling.
I cut my hair because you don't care about my heart.
Who thought the meme can be recycle from the other event?
Last Christmas, I gave you my heart But the very next day, you gave it away
After last night, I think I'm in love with you.
quotes.origin: After Last Night by Bruno Mars , Anderson .Paak & Silk Sonic

quotes.quote: Good morning teacher. How are you today? I'm fine, I'm okay. Better than our yesterday.
quotes.origin: Good Morning Teacher by Atom Chanakan
